titles.title: Fair and Inclusive Housing Rights Act of 2010
To amend the Fair Housing Act to prohibit discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation and gender identity, and for other purposes.
Fair and Inclusive Housing Rights Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary:
Fair and Inclusive Housing Rights Act of 2010 - Amends the Fair Housing Act to prohibit discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity in housing sales and rentals, residential real estate-related transactions, and brokerage services.
Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1968 to prohibit the intimidation, interference, or injury of individuals because of their sexual orientation or gender identity.
